official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the Secretary of Energy, the Governor of the State of Washington, and the President to take certain actions respecting the location, construction and operation of that portion of the Northern Tier Pipeline which is within the State of Washington, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Governor of Washington State to begin negotiations with the Northern Tier Pipeline Company concerning permits for the Northern Tier Pipeline. Sets forth a time frame for settling issues concerning such permits. Requires any issues that are unresolved after a specified time to be referred to the Secretary of Energy for arbitration. Authorizes the President, upon notification by the Secretary that an issue remains unresolved, to issue an Executive order approving the location, construction, and operation of the Northern Tier Pipeline.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the Secretary of Energy, the Governor of the State of Washington, and the President to take certain actions respecting the location, construction and operation of that portion of the Northern Tier Pipeline which is within the State of Washington, and for other purposes.
